mapper.select: SELECT BOX_CD, BOX_NM, BOX_COUNT, BOX_PRICE, DEPOSIT, ROW_COUNT, ROW_NUM, UPD_DT, UPD_ID, START_NUM, END_NUM, (SELECT COUNT(BOX_NUM) FROM ACM_BOX_NUM WHERE BOX_CD = AB.BOX_CD AND BOX_FLAG = 'Y') AS USE_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(BOX_NUM) FROM ACM_BOX_NUM WHERE BOX_CD = AB.BOX_CD AND BOX_FLAG = 'N') AS NOT_CNT FROM ACM_BOX AB ORDER BY AB.BOX_CD ASC
